questions.question_text: Which of the following should be the FIRST consideration when conducting a privacy impact assessment (PIA)?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Virtual private database

B. Virtual Private Database (VPD).

A Virtual Private Database (VPD) adds a dynamic data access control layer to a database, enabling fine-grained access control at the row and column levels within tables

questions.question_text: Which of the following would BEST enable a data warehouse to limit access to individual database objects?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Limiting the data that an organization collects, processes, and retains is a fundamental principle of data minimization, which is often a requirement in data privacy laws (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
